text: I've always wanted to be a mom at 23, 24ish, ever since I was a little girl. I'm right on schedule.
author: Brandy Norwood

text: It's her first grandchild, so she's really, really, really excited. I guess my mom is a little more stressed out than me.
author: Brandy Norwood

text: Mom would kill me if I showed my navel.
author: Brandy Norwood

text: My hat was pulled down and this girl said 'Are you really him?' I whispered 'Yeah, I'm really him.' She screamed, 'Mom! Dad! It's Heath Ledger!
author: Josh Hartnett

text: In all honesty, at that time, I never saw myself as an author... I was just a Mom in a state of panic, trying to enter a short story contest to win the prize money in order to keep the lights on in my home.
author: Leslie Banks
